name: kagebunshin
description: Serverless image resizer with AWS S3 Reduced Redundancy Storage

scripts.deploy:dockerbuild: rm -rf node_modules/sharp && docker run -v "$PWD":/var/task lambci/lambda:build-nodejs8.10 npm install sharp
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:dockerbuild && sls deploy --stage prod
scripts.dev: rm -rf node_modules/sharp && npm i && sls invoke local -f onUpload -p event.json
